    Aspire Services Sdn Bhd Vacancies L&D Specialist (E-Learning)

    October 25, 2020

    TOC

    • Job Description
    • Company Overview
    • How To Apply

    Aspire Services Sdn Bhd is looking for new potential candidates to fill in for L&D Specialist (E-Learning) position. If you currently looking for new education sector job opportunities and qualified with the job desc, feel free to apply this job.

    Job Description

    OVERALL PURPOSE OF THE JOB
    The Learning & Development, Content Specialist is responsible for collecting, updating and transferring content into eLearning format. The content will be used by the Service Delivery teams to service Aspire Lifestyles clients and their customers and will include curated learning content, partnerships and client benefits.
    This content will be maintained within the company’s content repositories. This position will require working with internal teams as well as third-party agencies and consultants to ensure complete, up-to-date and relevant content.
    The Learning & Development, Content Specialist will also support the internal facilitation of learning sessions as required and upheld our “Extraordinary Every Time” philosophy.
    SPECIFIC RESPONSIBILITIES
    Key Responsibilities
    • Support Learning & Development content development by sourcing, documenting, editing, fact-checking, proofreading and/or copy editing a variety of content, including development of eLearning format.
    • Work closely with cross-functional partners (including Service Delivery, Quality & Compliance, Partnerships and Digital Teams) to research and generate essential information in the creation of effective and accurate content.
    • Contributes to the development and implementation of Lifestyle Concierge training programs content.
    • Facilitation of user training sessions applying the Learning & Development Lifecycle phases of:
      • Requirements & Innovation
      • Plan, Design and Develop
      • Implement & Delivery
      • Embed & Evaluate & Support
    Other Duties
    • Works within and promote all International SOS’s policies, procedures and corporate values.
    • Familiar with International SOS’ OH&S policies, practices and procedures and actively participate in the ongoing development and enhancement of these important areas of our business.
    • Undertakes project work and other reasonable duties as requested by the Group Learning & Development, Regional Learning, Development and Quality Manager and Head of Aspire Lifestyles.
    JOB PROFILE
    • Excellent content development skills including developing eLearning content
    • Ability to adapt writing and editing style to different users and/or clients
    • Proficient in Microsoft Suite (Word, Excel, PowerPoint, Outlook)
    • Strong computer and internet skills - able to learn quickly in a technical environment
    • SharePoint Portal competency preferred
    • 1-3 years of experience content development for online / eLearning
    • Experience with content management systems, web content, and user experience
    • Previous Learning and Development experience within an operations or technical environment.
    • Experience working with a geographically dispersed team preferred
    • Tertiary educational qualifications relevant to service industry
    • Degree and/or certifications related to Content, Communications, or Marketing preferred
    • To support other, Aspire Lifestyles locations as and when required.
    • Ability to maintain a flexible work schedule that meets the program needs. This includes being able to workdays, nights, weekends, and holidays.

    Company Overview

    Aspire Lifestyles is the global leader in loyalty solutions and Concierge services.
    Engaging our clients’ customers by opening doors to high-touch personalized service, a wealth of special offers, access to extraordinary experiences and delivering extraordinary results, every time.
    Aspire Lifestyles, an International SOS Company is a Concierge industry pioneer with nearly 30 years of experience designing and managing high-performance loyalty and Concierge programs. Aspire Lifestyles continues to push the industry to the next level with innovative program design and features. With integrated global operations in 21 markets, robust digital platforms, an unmatched degree of global lifestyle partnerships, and a blueprint for savvy social media marketing, Aspire Lifestyles continues to shape the future of customer engagement and relationship management strategies.

    How To Apply

    If you confident and feel that this job is suitable to you, go ahead take your action now.
    Hope you find your dream education sector job in Kuala Lumpur.
    Apply Online
